welcome_message_body: Welcome to Weston, a charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches and laid-back atmosphere. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore and discover all that this lovely city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Passengers can connect to the network and follow the on-screen instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The dedicated terminal for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
